title: New: Shura – Touch
body:
I’m in love with everything about **Shura**.

From her early remixes, to her work with [Hiatus](https://hiatusmusic.bandcamp.com/album/parklands)… hell, even her off the cuff Facebook statuses are amazing (“And this morning I’m mainly reading Grimes’ twitter feed.” and “So let’s take a moment to appreciate Solange.” being prime examples. Her debut solo offering, _Touch_, has dominated the blogs over the last 24 hours and quite rightly so, drawing comparisons to Blood Orange, in it’s gorgeous pop sensibilities. Check it out below.
